page.title: 17SUPERNATURAL IN LINTON
page.content: There are not many people in Linton who know much about ghosts and haunted houses,but we did get a few stories. Here is a list of the haunted places and their ghosts.Richmond's House-a headless horseman,a house on Linton High Street-two figures,Queen's House- Robert Webbe,13 High Street-a hooded lady(possibly the virgin Mary). Quite a few people in Linton are superstitous.One lady in Linton said she was superstitous. Here are some of the superstitions she knew-do not put an umbrella up in the house,do not walk under a ladder. A house in Linton was being modernized and in one of the walls a jar of coloured thread was found.The story emerged that when the house was being built the jar of thread was put into the wall of the house to protect it against witches.
